description: A man in his 30s is being treated in hospital, following the incident.
title: Swindon stabbing: Suspect hunted after man seriously injured
title_page: Swindon stabbing: Suspect hunted after man seriously injured - BBC News
maintext:
Police are hunting a suspect after a man was seriously injured in a stabbing in a town centre.
Officers were called to Temple Street in Swindon at about 13:45 GMT on Friday after a man sustained a serious injury to his face. A cordon was put in place at the scene for several hours, but has now been lifted.
The victim, aged in his 30s, has been taken to hospital for treatment.
Police are appealing for anybody who witnessed the incident to contact them.
